item.title: [GROOVY-10357] STC crashes on compiling an abstract method with default arguments and lambda
item.description:
The following program

import java.util.function.Function;

abstract class A {
  abstract Long m(Function<Boolean, Integer> x = { Boolean x -> x ? 10: -10})
}
